Name: Black Bison Martini
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Review: A fragrant cocktail with a dry finish. As the name suggests, also works well with Zubrowka Bison vodka in place of gin.
History: Adapted from a drink discovered in 2001 at Oxo Tower Bar, London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Black Bison Martini contains 198 calories
